name: miserably
content:
miserably adverb
(UNHAPPILY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling or showing unhappiness: "It's no use - I can't do it," she said miserably. While the other kids played, we stared miserably out of the window.
in a way that is very unpleasant and makes you unhappy: It's been miserably wet (= raining a lot) all week.
